document.full_text: for decades, authoritarian rule and police brutality ensured the only voice heard from egypt was that of its leaders. since popular protests deposed president hosni mubarak, the silent majority has erupted into a cacophony.
document.title: egyptians find their voice after years of repression
lines_and_colors: for decades, authoritarian rule and police brutality ensured the only voice heard from egypt was that of its leaders. since popular protests deposed president hosni mubarak, the silent majority has erupted into a cacophony.
